label: Year
categories-empty-state-subtext: Categories can only be shown if your suppliers allocated emissions to your company. Request data through the Supply chain dashboard.
sectors-empty-state-subtext: Sectors can only be shown if your suppliers allocated emissions to your company. Request data through the Supply chain dashboard.
pie-chart-legend-unallocated-info-messag: Your scope 3 emissions that you cannot allocate to a Category or supplier
pie-chart-legend-allocated-info-message: Your scope 3 emissions that you can allocate to a Category or supplier
